PromotionLoyaltyPtnrProdt.name: PromotionLoyaltyPtnrProdt
PromotionLoyaltyPtnrProdt.description: Represents a relationship between a promotion and a loyalty partner product. It indicates the products or product categories that are applied to a particular promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPartnerId.description: The loyalty partner associated with the promotion.

LoyaltyPartnerProductId.description: Required. The loyalty partner product associated with the promotion loyalty partner product.

LoyaltyProductId.description: The loyalty product associated with the promotion.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the promotion loyalty partner product.

ProductCategoryId.description: The product category associated with the promotion.

PromotionId.description: The promotion associated with the promotion loyalty partner product.
